name: Add custom characters on the sides!
description:
Compatible with other Stylish themes and multiple screen resolutions. 

The characters are added to the sides of all MyAnimeList forum, club, and profile pages as seen in the screenshot.
additional_info:
200+ more renders (characters) can be found here, all without watermarks: http://imgur.com/a/ydViG
You can change characters or paste the URLs for your choice of character render on this theme's page when you update or install/reinstall it. After, you might need to adjust the positioning as well.

They have taken out the update button; you need to uninstall and reinstall the theme to update it. When you reinstall it, make your new character choices.

style_settings.label: Choose or upload a character on left:
Choose or upload a character on right:
